mapper.select:
select ta.id as "id" ,ta.acti_name as "actiName" ,ta.acti_address as "actiAddress" ,date_format(ta.acti_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiStartTime" ,date_format(ta.acti_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "actiEndTime" ,ta.apply_num as "applyNum" ,ta.acti_like as "actiLike" ,ta.acti_number as "actiNumber" ,ta.acti_poster_url as "actiPosterUrl" ,ta.show_apply_num as "showApplyNum" ,group_concat(ifnull(tc.avatar,tp.avatar))as "avatar" from tb_activity ta left join tb_activity_detail td on td.activity_id = ta.id left join tb_activity_apply ty on ty.activity_id = ta.id left join tb_user_person tp on tp.account = ty.account left join tb_user_company tc on tc.account = ty.account where 1=1 and ta.state not in ('1','5')
and ta.acti_type = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ta.acti_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or ta.acti_address LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%') or td.acti_detail LIKE concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')
group by ta.id order by ta.acti_order desc
